name: Gigi
best_build: Gadget: Longer Strings, Star Power: Plie Protection, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: A cursed puppet who brings an unsettling vibe, Gigi and her bonded magician's glove are never found apart. You can find her in the Oddities Shop, dancing between the bookshelves.

name: Ziggy
best_build: Gadget: Noe You See Me , Star Power: The Great Ziggini, Gears: Shield, Damage
best_modes: Brawl Ball, Hot Zone, Gem Grab
description: Ziggy is an uber theatrical magician who excels at using electricity in his act. He's a bit full of himself, but hey, he can literally control lightning. Just remember... they're not tricks, they're illusions.

name: Mina
best_build: Gadget: Windmill , Star Power: Blown Away, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Mina is a b-girl who mixes capoeira into her breakdance battles like it's second nature. She hangs out at SK8 Beats with Ollie and uses his mixtapes to practice new moves!

name: Trunk
best_build: Gadget: For the Queen , Star Power: New Insect Overlords , Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Trunk is a suspiciously uncanny looking tree. It couldn't be because Trunk is actually a colony of hyper-intelligent ants controlling a fake mechanical tree? No, that would be ridiculous.

name: Alli
best_build: Gadget: Feed the Gators , Star Power: You Better Run, You Better Take Cover, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Alli is the shy mechanic of the Love Swamp. She loves to get her hands dirty, by either fixing broken machines or... mercilessly stalking other Brawlers. If you're walking home late at night and hear an odd noise, it's probably Alli trying to say hello.

name: Kaze
best_build: Gadget: Hensojutsu , Star Power: Advanced Tecniques, Gears: Speed, Damage
best_modes: Hot Zone, Brawl Ball, Gem Grab
description: Kaze was raised to be a living weapon by her parents, but this was not the life she wanted. After escaping to Starr Park with Kenji, she can now live how she wants. However, she is still torn between the two aspects of her life, being a humble geisha and a deadly ninja.

name: Jae-Yong
best_build: Gadget: Weekend Warrior , Star Power: Extra High Note, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Jae-yong is your average office worker. By night, he is a karaoke GOD... or so he thinks. The jury is still out on his singing skills.

name: Finx
best_build: Gadget: Back to the Fınxture , Star Power: Primer, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: The owner of Starr Park's escape room, Finx is meant to help visitors complete tasks. Instead, he uses his time controlling abilities to cause mischief! Also, he LOVES cats.

name: Lumi
best_build: Gadget: Grim and Frostbitten , Star Power: 42 Burst, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: A passionate metalhead and a talented drummer, Lumi traded her drumsticks for morning stars when she got her job at Starr Park. She controls elements of ice and fire, which reflects her shy nature and her burning passion for music!

name: Ollie
best_build: Gadget: Regulate , Star Power: Renegade, Gears: Speed, Damage
best_modes: Brawl Ball, Hot Zone, Gem Grab
description: Ollie rides his customized hoverboard around Starr Park, grinding rails and causing trouble! A fan of old school hip hop, Ollie blasts his favorite tunes wherever he goes. His music is infectious... literally. Brawlers can't help but dance when they hear it.

name: Meeple
best_build: Gadget: Ragequit , Star Power: Do Not Pass Go, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Meeple knows the rules to every board game in existence and if you break them... Well let's just say you don't want to break them. They hate cheaters and those who break the rules. There's only one exception... Meeple themselves!

name: Juju
best_build: Gadget: Elementalist , Star Power: Guarded Gris-Gris, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Juju owns the Oddities Shop and is followed everywhere by her "pet" voodoo doll, Gris-Gris (pronounced Gregory). Although she can control the elements, Juju is also a talented toymaker who makes dolls to sell to Starr Park's many visitors.

name: Shade
best_build: Gadget: Longarms , Star Power: Hardened Hoodie, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Not much is known about this mysterious pile of clothes, other than the fact it has some cool sunglasses. Discovered by Gus, Shade was given a name and now the two spooky Brawlers haunt the Ghost Station together.

name: Kenji
best_build: Gadget: Hosomaki Healing , Star Power: Studied the Blade, Gears: Speed, Damage
best_modes: Brawl Ball, Hot Zone, Gem Grab
description: This highly skilled sushi chef has a wholesome life running his restaurant in Starr Park, but it feels like he's trying to hide something about his past... though his sushi tastes so good, nobody cares!

name: Moe
best_build: Gadget: Dodgy Digging  , Star Power: Skipping Stones, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Moe is a blind rat, found living in the Starr Park sewers by Grom, who then quickly adopted him! Now part of Starr Park's maintenance team, Moe uses his special digging machine, Driller, to traverse the sewer tunnels... and also cause a bit of destruction throughout the park, much to Ash's dismay.

name: Clancy
best_build: Gadget: Snappy Shooting , Star Power: Recon, Gears: Speed, Damage
best_modes: Brawl Ball, Hot Zone, Gem Grab
description: There's no turning back with Clancy (unless Hank orders him to). He's fully embraced his fake crustacean life and will do anything for his comrades.

name: Berry
best_build: Gadget: Friendship is Great , Star Power: Floor is Fine, Gears: Shield, Damage
best_modes: Brawl Ball, Hot Zone , Gem Grab
description: Working at Mandy's Candy Shop, what could go wrong? EVERYTHING! Luckily, Berry has the patience and toughness of a workhorse. He seems to hate every second of his job, but at the end of his shift, you might catch a brief smile.

name: Lily
best_build: Gadget: Vanish , Star Power: Spiky, Gears: Gadget Cooldown, Damage
description: A nerd at heart and a total witchcraft buff, Lily's thirst for knowledge once led her into the Enchanted Woods, where an incident involving a firefly and a carnivorous plant would change her life forever...

name: Draco
best_build: Gadget: Last Stand , Star Power: Shredding, Gears: Speed, Damage
best_modes: Brawl Ball, Hot Zone, Gem Grab
description: Riding his inflatable dragon and setting off fireworks, Draco promises a show-stopping finale every night. With his electric guitar blaring and his flame-spewing ride rocking the crowd, he turns the fantasy up to eleven!

name: Angelo
best_build: Gadget: Master Fletcher, Star Power: Empover, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Angelo is the Love Swamp's resident cupid-turned-mosquito. They buzz around the canals looking for lovebirds to dazzle with their irresistible charm, even if those require a little extra, pointy incentive.

name: Melodie
best_build: Gadget: Interlude , Star Power: Extended Mix, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: When it comes to Karaoke, Melodie shows no mercy. Armed with her kawaii looks and devilish set of pipes, she never fails to steal the limelight.

name: Larry & Lawrie
best_build: Gadget: Order: Fall Back , Star Power: Protocol: Protect, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Larry sells tickets to Starr Park visitors under the watchful eye of his twin, Lawrie. Larry loves rules, they make life easier! Lawrie doesn't love rules so much as enforcing them. They make a good team.

name: Kit
best_build: Gadget: Cardboard Box , Star Power: Power Hungry, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Stuck giving autographs to his rabid fans at Starr Toon Studios, cartoony superstar Kit often daydreams of becoming relevant in the industry again, respected for his acting chops rather than his looks.

name: Mico
best_build: Gadget: Clipping Scream , Star Power: Monkey Bussines, Gears: Health, Damage
description: Mico's the sound guy in Brawlywood, but one could be forgiven for thinking he's actually a celebrity given all the bragging and name-dropping. Hot-tempered and unstable, he cannot take a joke. Don't ever call him funny...

name: Charlie
best_build: Gadget: Spiders , Star Power: Digestive , Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Itsy bitsy Charlie Put on a crazy show She let down her hair And made off with all your dough In came the crowd It filled up the circus tent So Charlie weaved away while Taking every cent!

name: Chuck
best_build: Gadget: Rerouting , Star Power: Tickets Please, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Once a brilliant maestro, now a train conductor, Chuck traded the symphonies of the concert halls for the cacophonies of the Ghost Station, all in the hope of discovering the next big thing in music!

name: Pearl
best_build: Gadget: Overcooked , Star Power: Heat Shield, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Against all odds, Pearl found her way into Belle and Sam's hardened hearts thanks to her disarmingly warm nature. Besides, who can resist chocolate cookies?

name: Doug
best_build: Gadget: Extra Mustard , Star Power: Self Service, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Doug's hot dogs will extend your friends' shelf life.

name: Cordelius
best_build: Gadget: Replanting , Star Power: Comboshrooms, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Gardener and caretaker of the Enchanted Forest. Obsesses over mushrooms and is hostile towards strangers.

name: Hank
best_build: Gadget: Barricade, Star Power: Its gonna Blow, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Hank is a one-shrimp, one-tank army on a mission to liberate sea life from kitchens and markets everywhere. Chefs, consider yourselves on notice!

name: Maisie
best_build: Gadget: Disengage , Star Power: Tremors, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Maisie works as a safety coordinator, but deep down she enjoys dangerous situations. Sometimes, it almost feels like she has a hand in creating them.

name: Willow
best_build: Gadget: Dive , Star Power: Obsession, Gears: Shield, Damage
description: Willow works as a gondoliera in the Swamp of Love. She gives couples in search of a romantic evening the creepiest, most unsettling time they could imagine.

name: R-T
best_build: Gadget: Out of Line , Star Power: Recording, Gears: Vision, Damage
description: R-T is designed to be a helpful information kiosk, but he's also been given the task of monitoring all activity within Starr Park. For safety reasons, of course.

name: Mandy
best_build: Gadget: Cookie Crumbs , Star Power: Hard Candy, Gears: Vision, Damage
description: Mandy runs a candy store where she dresses in costume and doles out sweet treats. She's a little too into the act and rules her candy kingdom with an iron fist.

name: Gray
best_build: Gadget: Walking Cane , Star Power: New Perspective, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Gray styles himself as a character in an old silent film. He takes the act seriously but sometimes forgets to keep his mouth shut when doing finger bullets.

name: Chester
best_build: Gadget: Candy Beans , Star Power: Single Bell'o'Mania, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Chester makes vicious fun of anyone in sight, trying to get under their skin. The more hate he gets, the better... especially if that hater is Mandy!

name: Buster
best_build: Gadget: Slo-Mo Replay , Star Power: Kevlar Vest, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Buster took a film projector from the movie theater where he works so he can play around with it like a prop. It's dangerous and highly unprofessional!

name: Gus
best_build: Gadget: Kooky Pooper , Star Power: Health Bonanza, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Gus looks so much like a ghost child that he's often mistaken for one. Perhaps fittingly, he's an enthusiast of all things Supernatural, since he's too innocent to be scared.

name: Sam
best_build: Gadget: Magnetic Field , Star Power: Hearty Recovery, Gears: Gadget Cooldown, Damage
description: A former factory worker turned wanted member of the Goldarm Gang, Sam is always there to ensure Belle doesn't go too far on their latest heist!

name: Otis
best_build: Gadget: Phat Splatter , Star Power: Ink Refills, Gears: Speed, Damage
best_modes: Brawl Ball, Hot Zone, Gem Grab
description: Otis is a young street artist on the come-up who works by shooting ink at the walls. Nobody knows his true identity, which only adds to his mystique!

name: Bonnie
best_build: Gadget: Sugar Rush , Star Power: Black Powder, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Bonnie is a bundle of uncontrollable and totally destructive energy. Her dream is to be fired from her cannon, all the way to the moon!

name: Janet
best_build: Gadget: Drop the Bass , Star Power: Vocal Warm Up, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Janet will do whatever it takes to reach the top! As a bonus, her performing skills come in handy for rescuing her sister Bonnie, whenever she gets into trouble.

name: Eve
best_build: Gadget: Gotta Go , Star Power: Happy Suprise, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Eve's purpose in life is to mother and protect her precious babies! She'll do whatever it takes to find them a good home... preferably in Ruffs' fur

name: Fang
best_build: Gadget: Roundhouse Kick , Star Power: Fresh Kicks, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Fang has absorbed so many kung-fu movies he practically lives in one. He's confident, charming, and never uses his hands if he can kick instead!

name: Lola
best_build: Gadget: Freeze Frame , Star Power: Improsive, Gears: Speed, Damage
best_modes: Brawl Ball, Hot Zone, Gem Grab
description: Lola makes sure everyone knows when she enters a room. She's an expert in the fine art of causing a scene to get what she wants, and she's proud of it!

name: Meg
best_build: Gadget: Jolting Volts , Star Power: Force Field, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Content to work behind the scenes with her trusty mecha suit, Meg takes care of real problems, while Max and Surge are out entertaining the crowds.

name: Ash
best_build: Gadget: Chill Pill , Star Power: First Bash, Gears: Speed, Damage
best_modes: Brawl Ball, Gem Grab, Hot Zone
description: Ash has the thankless job of keeping the park clean. He's climbed into a trash can to protect himself from broken glass and rat bites. It makes him grumpy!

name: Griff
best_build: Gadget: Piggy Bank, Star Power: Business Resilince, Gears: Speed, Damage
best_modes: Brawl Ball, Hot Zone, Gem Grab
description: Griff acts like a rich, successful entrepreneur, but his only business is the failing Starr Park Gift Shop. Oddly, he's never around when the bank calls.

name: Buzz
best_build: Gadget: Reserve Buoy , Star Power: Eyes Sharp, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Buzz is a lifeguard at the Velocirapids water park and a real stickler for the rules. He clearly enjoys wielding the tiny bit of authority he has to the greatest degree possible.

name: Grom
best_build: Gadget: Radio Check , Star Power: X-Factor, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Grom is a brawny security guard with one weak point: the flashbacks he gets from his time working at a kindergarten. Those kids were merciless.

name: Squeak
best_build: Gadget: Residue , Star Power: Chain Reaction, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Squeak is a blob of happy energy who loves his creator, Ruffs. He's a joy to be around, at least if you are unaware that he's made of dog slobber

name: Belle
best_build: Gadget: Reverse Polarity,Star Power: Positive Feedback , Gears: Vision, Damage
description: The leader of the notorious Goldarm Gang, Belle is after more than money. She wants to find out the truth behind Starr Park and bring it down!

name: Stu
best_build: Gadget: Breakthrough , Star Power: Gaso-Heal, Gears: Shield, Damage
description: A little punch-drunk from too many bumps, bruises, and gasoline fumes over his long stunt performing career, Stu is a bit wobbly on his wheel these days.

name: Ruffs
best_build: Gadget: Irresistible Attraction , Star Power: Power Grab, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Ruffs is a loyal, highly disciplined space colonel who runs a tight ship and does everything by the book. But deep down, he just wants to be a good boy!

name: Edgar
best_build: Gadget: Hardcore, Star Power: Fisticuffs, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Edgar believes nobody understands him. Certainly not his mom, who thinks he's going through a phase. Only he knows the darkness in his soul is eternal.

name: Byron
best_build: Gadget: Booster Shots , Star Power: Malaise, Gears: Vision, Damage
description: Byron has invented many concoctions and tinctures that heal or harm in various ways.... but most of them fall into the harming category

name: Lou
best_build: Gadget: Cyro Syrup , Star Power: Supercool, Gears: Vision, Damage
best_modes: Brawl Ball, Hot Zone, Gem Grab
description: Lou is a robot snow cone salesman who's yet to make his first sale. Being located on a snowy mountain peak might have something to do with that.

name: Amber
best_build: Gadget: Fıre Starters , Star Power: Wınd Flames, Gears: Speed, Damage
best_modes: Brawl Ball, Hot Zone, Gem Grab
description: Amber brings the heat, literally! She's overconfident about her fire abilities despite being a bit of a klutz. With her, it's spectacle first, and safety last.

name: Colette
best_build: Gadget: Gotcha! , Star Power: Push It, Gears: Gadget Cooldown, Damage
description: Colette has collected every single figurine, plushie, and toy of every single Brawler. Is she obsessed? Yes. But has she lost touch with reality? Also yes.

name: Surge
best_build: Gadget: Power Shield, Star Power: Serve Ice Cold, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Surge is a souped-up soda fountain, always ready to get the party started! He's got the beats, the moves, and an endless supply of energy drinks.

name: Sprout
best_build: Gadget: Transplant , Star Power: Photosynthesist, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Sprout appears to be a cute gardening robot who helps Rosa around the Biodome, but it's actually an incubator with arms and wheels for a strange pink seed!

name: Nani
best_build: Gadget: Return To Sender , Star Power: Autofocus, Gears: Speed, Gadget Cooldown
description: Originally a security camera, Nani was modified to keep an eye on Jessie. Unfortunately, she can hardly keep up with the precocious girl!

name: Gale
best_build: Gadget: Twister , Star Power: Blustery Blow, Gears: Vision, Damage
description: Gale's job is to use his snowblower to clear the areas around Mr. P's Snowtel. Nobody mentioned anything about stopping when the guests were around...

name: Jacky
best_build: Gadget: Pneumatic Booster , Star Power: Counter Crush, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Jacky is a miner who can't resist mouthing off about her wild work experiences using very colorful language! Luckily, the bad words are drowned out by the noise of her jackhammer

name: Max
best_build: Gadget: Phase Shifter , Star Power: Run'n Gun, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Fuelled by energy drinks, Max speeds to the scene whenever someone needs help. She never sticks around long enough to do much... but she sure is fast!

name: Mr. P
best_build: Gadget: Porter Reinforcements , Star Power: Revolving Door, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Mr. P is in over his head trying to run a hotel. He's always yelling at his employees to work faster, as if they could understand his gibberish!

name: Emz
best_build: Gadget: Friendzoner , Star Power: Hype, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Emz supposedly works for her uncle Mortis at the mortuary, but she rarely makes an appearance there. She's too busy hawking her hairspray brand online.

name: Bea
best_build: Gadget: Rattled Hive , Star Power: Honeycomb , Gears: Shield, Damage
best_modes: Brawl Ball, Hot Zone, Gem Grab
description: Bea spends her day watching bugs as they go about their lives, imagining what they'd say if she could understand them... or even what it's like to be one.

name: Sandy
best_build: Gadget: Sweet Dreams , Star Power: Rude Sands , Gears: Speed, Damage
best_modes: Brawl Ball, Hot Zone, Gem Grab
description: On the rare occasions Sandy wakes from his slumber, he tries to help his big sister Tara around their store. But it's never long before he falls asleep again.

name: 8-Bit
best_build: Gadget: Cheat Cartridge , Star Power: Plugged in, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: An arcade game famous for its brutal difficulty, 8-Bit always hated its players. Now that it's missing one of its guns, it's angrier than ever before.

name: Bibi
best_build: Gadget: Vitamin Booster , Star Power: Batting Stance Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Bibi is a tough punk with a baseball bat and an attitude to match. She's a bit of a nerd too, but she'd never show it. She's got an image to maintain!

name: Carl
best_build: Gadget: Heat Ejector , Star Power: Protective Piroutte, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Carl is a mining robot who's fascinated by rocks and stones of all kinds. Don't let him get started on his latest obsession: the effects of Gems!

name: Rosa
best_build: Gadget: Unfriendly Bushes , Star Power: Thorny Gloves, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Rosa is a botanist with a strong connection to plants. She's also a boxer, and won't hesitate to punch one of her specimens if it goes out of control!

name: Leon
best_build: Gadget: Lollipop Drop , Star Power: Invisiheal , Gears: Vision, Damage
description: Since Leon doesn't like hanging with other people much, his ability to become invisible comes in handy. Only his little sister, Nita, seems to get through to him.

name: Tick
best_build: Gadget: Last Hurrah, Star Power: Automa-tick Reload , Gears: Shield, Damage
description: Tick follows Penny around like a pet as she plots her next big scheme. He isn't good for much besides blowing things up, but that's usually plenty!

name: Gene
best_build: Gadget: Lamp Blowout , Star Power: Spirit Slap , Gears: Damage, Vision
description: Most people look at Gene and see a funny little guy in a costume. What they don't see is that his personality is split between his body and his teapot.

name: Frank
best_build: Gadget: Irresistible Attraction , Star Power: Power Grab, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Frank is a good-natured giant who helps out at the mortuary by day and spins tunes at the Club by night. He doesn't get a lot of sleep, and it shows.

name: Penny
best_build: Gadget: Trusty Spyglasses , Star Power: Heavy Coffers , Gears: Vision, Damage
description: Penny doesn't care about studying old maps or puzzling over sea shanty riddles. She's a pirate so she can blow stuff up and grab whatever she wants!

name: Darryl
best_build: Gadget: Tar Barrel , Star Power: Steel Hoops , Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Darryl put on the pirate captain's hat in a bid to avoid work, but now he's forced to defend his ship! Who knew being in charge took actual effort?

name: Tara
best_build: Gadget: Support From Beyond , Star Power: Healing Shade , Gears: Speed, Damage
best_modes: Brawl Ball, Hot Zone, Gem Grab
description: Tara has seen in the cards that great difficulties lie ahead! But don't despair... she has a terrific selection of magical trinkets for sale to help with that.

name: Pam
best_build: Gadget: Scrapsucker , Star Power: Mama's Squeeze' , Gears: Speed, Damage
best_modes: Hot Zone, Brawl Ball, Gem Grab
description: Pam handles an enormous workload at the junkyard and always gets it done! It's just a shame it keeps her away from her daughter, Jessie...

name: Piper
best_build: Gadget: Auto Aimer , Star Power: Snappy Sniping , Gears: Shield, Damage
description: Piper wants nothing more than to be the local village baker who hands out pies, cookies and other sweet treats! Just don't ask about her past.

name: Bo
best_build: Gadget: Tripware , Star Power: Snare a Bear , Gears: Speed, Damage
best_modes: Brawl Ball, Hot Zone, Gem Grab
description: Bo has survived in the Rumble Jungle for a long time. It's all the more impressive considering he's been using toys he got on sale from the Gift Shop.

name: Poco
best_build: Gadget: Tuning Fork , Star Power: Scheering Solo , Gears: Speed, Damage
best_modes: Brawl Ball, Hot Zone, Gem Grab
description: Poco believes music can change people's lives. He's so enthusiastic about it that he never stops playing, even after people ask him to!

name: Crow
best_build: Gadget: Defense Booster , Star Power: Extra Toxic , Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Crow trusts no one and keeps to himself. The most anyone knows about him is that he's often found at the diner, hanging out with Bull and Bibi.

name: Mortis
best_build: Gadget: Survive Shovel , Star Power: Coiled Snake , Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Mortis had grand designs built around being a mortician and a vampire, but the fact that nobody is dying at Starr Park has put a huge damper on his plans.

name: El Primo
best_build: Gadget: Suplex Suppletement , Star Power: El Fuego , Gears: Speed, Damage
description: El Primo is always in the spotlight and that's right where he wants to be! There's no audience he can't win over, except maybe his fellow performers...

name: Dynamike
best_build: Gadget: Satchel Charge , Star Power: Demolition , Gears: Shield, Damage
description: Dynamike is an old miner and prospector who's become obsessed with explosions. Nothing makes him happier than a big boom!

name: Nita
best_build: Gadget: Bear Paws , Star Power: Hyper Bear, Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Nita is a ferocious child who never backs down from a fight! The teddy bear on her head serves as a warning to others: don't poke the bear.

name: Jessie
best_build: Gadget: Recoil Spring , Star Power: Shocky , Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Jessie is a prodigy who builds guns and gadgets from parts she finds in the junkyard. Maybe one day her mother Pam will see she can fend for herself!

name: Barley
best_build: Gadget: Herbal Tonic , Star Power: Medical Use , Gears: Shield, Damage
description: A bartending robot designed to mix drinks and banter with patrons, Barley also makes sure to keep his bar clean, to the detriment of anyone who makes a mess.

name: Spike
best_build: Gadget: Life Plant , Star Power: Curveball , Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Most people think Spike is Colt and Shelly's cute sidekick at the Ranger Ranch. Nobody could begin to guess the depths of his trauma

name: Rico
best_build: Gadget: Multiball Launcher , Star Power: Super bouncy , Gears: Vision, Damage
description: Rico is definitely a real space bounty hunter who tracks down the galaxy's most wanted criminals, not a gumball machine pretending to be cool.

name: Brock
best_build: Gadget: Rocket Fuel , Star Power: Rocket No.4 , Gears: Shield, Damage
description: Brock is a smack-talking video game enthusiast. His big attitude hides a more introverted personality, but he'll still do whatever it takes to win!

name: Bull
best_build: Gadget: Stomper , Star Power: Tough Guy , Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Bull isn't as carefree as he was in his youth, but just because his rowdy days are behind him doesn't mean he won't still crush someone who's asking for it.

name: Colt
best_build: Gadget: Silver Bullet , Star Power: Slick Boots , Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Colt is the star attraction at Starr Park! His good looks, charisma and gun twirling tricks win over any audience, except maybe Shelly.

name: Shelly
best_build: Gadget: Clay Pigeons , Star Power: Shell Shock , Gears: Speed, Damage
description: Shelly's the perfect ranger: reliable, tough, and terrific with her shotgun. She never understood why Colt got to steal the limelight...
